document_data.name: ''Bloodstone Double Axe''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Bloodstone double axe''''' was an enchanted [[double axe]] from [[Tethyr]].
document_data.Powers: This double-ended [[axe]] was enchantmented and granted its wielder [[regeneration]].
document_data.History:
''Bloodstone double axe'' belonged to the [[Bloodstone (mercenaries)|Bloodstone]] mercenary group ''circa'' [[1090 DR]]. The history remembered this particular company for their attempted participation in the [[Battle of the Bones]] of 1090 DR. The mercenaries outfitted themselves, sparing no expanse for the battle. However, the ship that transported the Bloodstones from [[Tethyr]] was swarmed and sank. This dread double axe remained on the very few reminders of their existence.

In [[1373 DR]], the ''Bloodstone double axe'' was in the hands of the leader of the [[Bloodaxe (tribe)|Bloodaxe]]. After his death, however, the axe's whereabouts remained unclear.
document_data.Notable Owners: *Jarl [[Bashnagg]]: the leader of the nomadic [[frost giant]] Bloodaxe tribe that dwelt in a cave between [[Voonlar]] and [[YÃ»lash]] ''circa'' 1373 DR.
